identificationModule.briefTitle: Diagnostic Characterization and Evolution of "Triple Negative" Thrombocytosis (CASTETTE)
identificationModule.officialTitle: Diagnostic Characterization and Evolution of "Triple Negative" Thrombocytosis

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Evaluation of Event free survival in patients with triple-negative thrombocytosis
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Patients with non-reactive thrombocytosis, explored at least by bone marrow biopsy and NGS panel will be included. Clinical and biological characteristics as well as evolution will be recorded retrospectively.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with non reactive thrombocytosis for at least 6 months
* availability of bone marrow biopsy and NGS panel

Exclusion Criteria:

* Unable to consent
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Patients followed by hematologists of the French Intergroup of MPN

ipdSharingStatementModule.description: All collected data that underlie results in a publication
ipdSharingStatementModule.timeFrame: Data will be available beginning three years and ending fifteen years following the final study report completion
ipdSharingStatementModule.accessCriteria: Data access requests will be reviewed by the internal committee of Brest UH. Requestors will be required to sign and complete a data access agreement
